MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth, affecting properties in Bute Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:05pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10pm on Saturday 23rd January 2021.
